text:
Supported for DCs!? Ah, really? Since when? Maybe my workload just got adjusted
for better. 
--
There are 10 kinds of people in the world...
 those who understand binary and those who don't. 
¯\_(ツ)_/¯

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from melvin.backus@byers.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Supported for DCs!? Ah, really? Since when? Maybe my workload just got adjusted
for better. 
--
There are 10 kinds of people in the world...
         those who understand binary and those who don't. 
¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 
From: 'CR Hiestand' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 8, 2024 9:25 AM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2 
In-place upgrades have worked very well for years despite many folks still
hesitating to use them. It’s even supported for DCs!
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/1ADD796D2529E94DB4552E7C1F12A21A020671403D%40ATLEXCH03.byers.local
